body_html: TensorFlow 1.3 was the release before we removed RTLD_GLOBAL, so that's always monolithic and won't know about the option. Looks like the C++ API .so had no linker script for that version. So you could either backport the linker script in drpngx@3438981 or use a more recent version.
body_text: TensorFlow 1.3 was the release before we removed RTLD_GLOBAL, so that's always monolithic and won't know about the option. Looks like the C++ API .so had no linker script for that version. So you could either backport the linker script in drpngx@3438981 or use a more recent version.
body: TensorFlow 1.3 was the release before we removed RTLD_GLOBAL, so that's always monolithic and won't know about the option. Looks like [the C++ API .so had no linker script for that version](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/408fd454d7d2a16269576ea12bcd516e25a6b0c5/tensorflow/BUILD#L446). So you could either backport the linker script in https://github.com/drpngx/tensorflow/commit/3438981ca7b659e57fb1e15152a1f9fd99b5d6bc or use a more recent version.
